metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Richard Carchman, Vice President, Scientific Affairs, Philip Morris USA & Philip Morris International. Testimony covers Philip Morris efforts to design a cigarette with no or little nicotine. View the transcript of the tape on Bates #3990133771/3990133935.
metadata.subject: tobacco; cigarette; lawsuit ; legal activity; testimony; tobacco industry; laboratory research; nicotine; genetic engineering; tobacco industry scientist; cigarette ingredient; mainstream smoke; tobacco smoke; Browse by keywords in UCSF industry videos
metadata.title: DEPOSITION: RICHARD CARCHMAN, PH.D. DATE: 971023 WA TAPE 3 OF 3 LENGTH: 5:00 COPY
